hsterms:CompositeResource.dc:title: Example Data II For Surface Water and Ocean Topography Hydrology Community Discharge (SWOT SHCQ)

rdf:Description.dcterms:abstract: Example data for SWOT SHCQ. This data includes both a template file as well as some example data for development of retrieval tools in confluence. Please note the the included discharge data are a mix of model and gage outputs and are not meant for scientific use.

hsterms:CompositeResource.dc:subject: velocity
